articles.author: MARK STEVENSON
articles.title: Mexico: 3 bodies found in Baja California in search for foreigners - The Associated Press
articles.description: Mexican authorities say three bodies have been recovered in an area of Baja California near where two Australians and an American went missing last weekend. The state prosecutors office did not say Friday night whether the bodies were those of the foreigners,…
articles.content: MEXICO CITY (AP) Mexican authorities said Friday that three bodies were recovered in an area of Baja California near where two Australians and an American went missing last weekend during an apparent… [+3326 chars]
